trans-unit.source: Knight of the Reliquary gets +1/+1 for each land card in your graveyard. {T}, Sacrifice a Forest or Plains: Search your library for a land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

LEVEL 5+ 5/5 First strike
Vigilance {4}{W}: Lionheart Maverick gets +1/+2 until end of turn.
"Your signet is no symbol of power. It marks only your need for numbers to aid you. What do you do, guild-rat, now that you face my blade alone?"

trans-unit.resname: DDG·5 | Knight of Meadowgrain | Card Text
trans-unit.source: First strike, lifelink

trans-unit.resname: DDG·5 | Knight of Meadowgrain | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "By tradition, we don't speak for two days after battle. If our deeds won't speak for themselves, what else could be said?"

trans-unit.resname: DDG·6 | Knight of the White Orchid | Card Text
trans-unit.source: First strike When Knight of the White Orchid enters the battlefield, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

trans-unit.resname: DDG·6 | Knight of the White Orchid | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Both guide and guard on open plain.
Flying
The skyhunters were born when the first leonin gazed at the heavens and wished to hunt the birds overhead.
First strike, protection from red
"Hammer out your doubts as you forge your weapon. To slay a dragon, your resolve must be stronger than your steel."
First strike, protection from black
Out of the blackness and stench of the engulfing swamp emerged a shimmering figure. Only the splattered armor and ichor-stained sword hinted at the unfathomable evil the knight had just laid waste.
Whenever Knotvine Paladin attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each untapped creature you control.
"He is part of a new breed of guardian, one who embraces the best of both his world and ours."\n—Mayael the Anima

trans-unit.resname: DDG·11 | Steward of Valeron | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Vigilance {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

trans-unit.source: Knight-stewards guard the Sun-Dappled Court, a grove of immense, sculptured olive trees that represent Valeron's twelve noble families.

Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.) {1}{W}{W}: Target Knight creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
"Command is the act of balancing on a vine and convincing others that it is firm ground."\n—Sidar Jabari
First strike Other Knight creatures you control get +1/+1 and are indestructible.

Vigilance
Every elf in Shadowmoor is charged from birth with a terrible duty: to strike back against the ugliness and darkness, even though they are all around and seemingly without end.

Ambidexterity is common among kithkin. The thoughtweft links the minds of the left- and right-handed, giving each the knack of the other.

"We leonin have come to rule the plains by taking to the skies."\n—Raksha Golden Cub
Flying, first strike
The knights are a major attraction at every Lammastide festival. Teams of riders perform daring feats of flight to the delight of all below.

trans-unit.resname: DDG·21 | Juniper Order Ranger | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature and a +1/+1 counter on Juniper Order Ranger.

trans-unit.resname: DDG·21 | Juniper Order Ranger | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: To protect the alliance between Kjeldor and Yavimaya, they trained in the ways of both.

trans-unit.resname: DDG·22 | Paladin of Prahv | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever Paladin of Prahv deals damage, you gain that much life. Forecast — {1}{W}, Reveal Paladin of Prahv from your hand: Whenever target creature deals damage this turn, you gain that much life. (Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)
The next 2 damage that a source of your choice would deal to you and/or permanents you control this turn is dealt to target creature or player instead.
Even when fate is already written, there's always time to change the names.
Exile target creature that dealt damage to you this turn.
